File_Description: Data package level readme. Contains data package summary; acknowledgements; and contact information.
File-level metadata that lists and describes all of the files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE FLMD v1; ESS-DIVE CSV v1

File_Description: Data dictionary that defines column and row headers across all tabular data files (files ending in ".csv" or ".tsv") in the data package.
File containing the final code used for the published manuscript including calculations, figures, and statistics.
Documentation on how to reproduce the workflow and analyses in this data package.
Instructions for accessing, downloading, and formatting the publicly available data referenced in this data package.

File containing phosphorus nuclear magnetic resonance deconvolution results for both degradation and non-degradation corrected samples. Orthophosphate; monoester region; diester region; and pyrophosphate are quantified.
File containing phosphorus nuclear magnetic resonance molecular species level quantification.
File containing the chemical shifts of known compounds that were spiked into phosphorus nuclear magnetic resonance experiments.

File containing background and normalization parameters used in phosphorus X-ray absorption near edge structure initial linear combination fits conducted using LCF_Package_P_Fits.Rmd for reference compound library identification.

Athena program output for background subtracted and normalized reference compound Pi_Al_GibbSorb used for phosphorus X-ray absorption near edge structure linear combination fits. See P-XANES_RefCmpd_Table.pdf in Grieger et al. (2022) for details on reference compound.
